subject: Sickle Cell Anemia
Football
lead_paragraph: Ryan Clark knew about the condition when the Steelers played at Denver in 2007, but was unaware of the risk of exerting himself at high altitude and landed in the hospital.
snippet: Ryan Clark knew about the condition when the Steelers played at Denver in 2007, but was unaware of the risk of exerting himself at high altitude and landed in the hospital.
